name: Paragon: A Haroldverse Story
description:
In a bizarre corner of the multiverse, sexy beatboxing martial artist Lucius and his loyal band of friends confront an ancient evil.

Please consider for the following awards:

Marsha Award for Melodies - tight AF beatboxing as you may have heard mentioned

Lucius Award for Laughs - still proud of that crotch cutin

Hrld Award for Visual Arts - action sequences count!
